text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

translation.en: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused
translation.id: Dan (ingatlah) ketika Kami berfirman kepada para malaikat, "Sujudlah kamu kepada Adam!" Lalu mereka pun sujud kecuali Iblis; dia menolak
